title: Community Cohesion
vision: All neighborhoods will be safe, cohesive, free of violent crime, and capable of supporting their residents' success

targets.name: Reduce crime
targets.content: Reduce violent crime rate to the statewide average of 3 crimes per 1,000 residents

targets.name: Reconnect residents
targets.content: Reduce recidivism rate for adults by 25%

targets.name: Build trust
targets.content: Increase percentage of adults who report trusting their neighbors by 50%

definitions.definition: Recidivism rate refers to the share of people released from prison or jail each year who return to jail within a certain period of time.
